title: Council of Economic Advisers
deleted: *Since the announcement of the resignation of [[Tomas J. Philipson]] as chair on June 24th, 2020 -- and the year before that, of member [[Kevin Hassett]] -- <ref name=wp1>Costa, Robert, Ashley Parker, Josh Dawsey and Jeff Stein, [https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/06/24/white-house-economist-philipson-departure/ "A second senior economist is abruptly leaving the White House amid ongoing economic crisis"], ''Washington Post'', June 24, 2020. Retrieved 2020-06-24.</ref> [[Tyler Goodspeed]] will be the only member of the council as of the end of June, 2020, per current report.
